Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz struggled with tracking fly balls, leading to defensive miscues that resulted in runs for the Royals.
Mitch Keller's pitching performance was affected by Cruz's defensive misplays during his first game in center field.
Post-Match Reflections: Pirates manager Derek Shelton acknowledged that defensive adjustments are part of the learning process for Cruz in center field.
Cruz's defensive struggles contributed to the Royals' victory over the Pirates.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates lost the game 5-1 to the Royals.
Cruz's transition to center field and defensive challenges were key topics in the post-game analysis.
